issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5.Description:
1. Launch KS.
2. Go to Phone -->Play Movie--> local & remote streaming.

h5.Actual Result:
1. We do not see any video, we just hear sound.

h5.Expected Result:
1. We should see video as well as the sound.
fields.summary: BlackBerry: KitchenSink: Phone > Play Movie; We hear sound but we don't see any video
